mods.abstract: The pyramid boys at Gizeh. A group of Egyptian boys before the old tree lined path to the Pyramids of Gizeh (foreground); Pyramid of Khufu complex, Pyramid of Khafre complex, Menkaure's Pyramic complex right to left (left background); "Zangaki No. 410 La retoure des Pyramides" in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
